column17:
Product Description

Organic Surge tropical bergamot body scrub is made from finely ground apricot stones and walnut shells which gently exfoliate and smooth the skin while sweet almond oil softens and replenishes skin moisture. Enriched with organic bergamot and sweet orange essential oils which eliminate toxins and help to distress. It is suitable for all skin types and free from animal derived ingredients. Available in 200ml.
